question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. broadway flag
B. bus
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The bus is in the foreground, occupying a large portion of the lower frame and appearing larger and more detailed than the Broadway flag, which is on a distant building in the background.
